method: Pour wine into a saucepan and add remaining ingredients (you can put whole spices in muslin).  Heat until nearly boiling and strain (if necessary) into a warm bowl. Serve warm.
ingredients: 1 litre bottle cheap red wine,  30z/75g sugar (to taste),  1 tsp whole cloves,  1 tsp ground cinnamon or stick cinnamon,  juice of 1 orange and 1 lemon
